description: 学习定语从句的基础用法：修饰名词或代词

explanation.basic_structure: 先行词 + 关系代词/关系副词 + 从句
basic_rules: 定语从句用来修饰名词或代词
关系代词：who, whom, which, that, whose
关系代词在从句中作主语、宾语或定语
usage_cases: 修饰人：The man who is standing there is my teacher. (站在那里的那个人是我的老师)
修饰物：The book which I bought yesterday is very interesting. (我昨天买的那本书很有趣)
修饰地点：This is the school where I studied. (这是我学习的学校)
common_errors: The man who is standing there is my teacher. (正确)
The book which I bought yesterday is very interesting. (正确)
This is the school where I studied. (正确)
usage_tips: 关系代词在从句中作主语时不能省略
关系代词在从句中作宾语时可以省略

who_people: The man who is standing there is my teacher.
The woman who is talking to you is my mother.
The boy who is playing football is my brother.
The girl who is singing is my sister.
The person who helped me is my friend.
which_things: The book which I bought yesterday is very interesting.
The car which is parked outside is mine.
The house which we visited is very beautiful.
The computer which I use every day is very fast.
The movie which we watched last night was great.
that_people_things: The man that is standing there is my teacher.
The book that I bought yesterday is very interesting.
The car that is parked outside is mine.
The house that we visited is very beautiful.
The computer that I use every day is very fast.
where_places: This is the school where I studied.
That is the hospital where I was born.
This is the park where we often play.
That is the restaurant where we had dinner.
This is the library where I often study.

templates.question: The man _____ is standing there is my teacher.
The book _____ I bought yesterday is very interesting.
The man _____ is standing there is my teacher.
This is the school _____ I studied.

templates.requirement: 用定语从句造句：站在那里的那个人是我的老师
templates.example: The man who is standing there is my teacher.

templates.requirement: 用定语从句造句：我昨天买的那本书很有趣
templates.example: The book which I bought yesterday is very interesting.

learning_objectives: 掌握定语从句的基本用法
能够正确使用关系代词和关系副词
了解定语从句修饰名词或代词

assessment_criteria.excellent: 能够熟练使用定语从句，无语法错误
assessment_criteria.good: 基本掌握定语从句用法，偶有错误
assessment_criteria.satisfactory: 了解定语从句基本用法，需要加强练习
assessment_criteria.needs_improvement: 对定语从句用法不熟悉，需要重新学习
